Background

Practice Specialty is in the preparation of patent applications and advocacy before the U.S. Patent Office.

Technical Emphasis is in electrical engineering, including RF, telecommunications, digital signal processing, analog and digital electronics, and computer software.

EE Background

Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering, University of Washington, 1995.

Ten years in electrical technology and engineering. Centrally involved with the research and development of radio receivers using digital signal processing technology. Experience includes the design of a novel image-rejection receiver architecture, digital filters, multi-rate DSP downconverters, and algorithms for signal detection and analysis.

Experience with a wide variety of analog and digital electronic technology and several computer programming languages. Extensive participation in the preparation and prosecution of numerous pending patents related to electrical engineering work.
